MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G74 and G76 postcode areas of Glasgow, Thornton Hall, Clarkston and East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:30pm. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:57pm on 4th November 2020.
